document_data.caption: A map showing Tornsar Alley and surroundings in the Southern Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Tornsar Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Tornsar Alley''' was a small side alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Tornsar Alley was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. The alley ran east to west, connecting [[Buckle Street]] in the west with the [[Rising Ride]] in the east just south of [[Caravan Court]].
document_data.Notable Locations: A portion of the [[House of Good Spirits]] was located along Tornsar Alley.
